meanings.definition: A person who arranges things in a neat or organized way.
meanings.sent1: The orderlies neatly arranged the books on the shelves.
meanings.sent2: The orderlies kept the room tidy and well-organized.
meanings.sent3: The orderlies made sure everything was in its proper place, like puzzle pieces fitting together.
meanings.sent4: The orderlies were like conductors, orchestrating the room into a harmonious symphony of order.
meanings.sent5: The orderlies' precision in arranging items was like watching a skilled artist at work.

meanings.definition: A person who assists medical staff in a hospital.
meanings.sent1: The orderlies helped the nurses with patient care.
meanings.sent2: The hospital orderlies were always ready to lend a hand to the doctors.
meanings.sent3: The orderlies joked with the patients to lift their spirits during their hospital stay.
meanings.sent4: The orderlies were the unsung heroes of the hospital, supporting the medical team behind the scenes.
meanings.sent5: The orderlies' dedication to assisting the medical staff was truly admirable.
